thread.title: CBT Nuggets Announces Cisco CCIE Course
thread.title_full: CBT Nuggets Announces Cisco CCIE Course - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: CBT Nuggets Announces Cisco CCIE Course
text:
New video training course with Anthony Sequeira covers the infrastructure services domain of the Cisco CCIE routing and switching certification exam.
Eugene, Oregon (PRWEB) October 01, 2015
CBT Nuggets announces the release of a new video training course, " Cisco CCIE RS v5 All-In-One: 6.0 Infrastructure Services ."
This 12-video course focuses on infrastructure services, one of the domains of Cisco's CCIE R&S v5 certification exam, and is aimed at IT professionals and students who have strong networking experience. CBT Nuggets trainer Anthony Sequeira covers topics such as device management, quality of service, NTP, and more.
"The CCIE certification sets a candidate apart like no other professional certification in the IT industry," Sequeira said. "This is a simple matter of supply and demand (there are relatively few CCIEs), and the fact that it is so incredibly difficult to achieve."
This training is associated with Cisco's CCIE R&S v5 certification, and is the final in a series of six CBT Nuggets courses devoted to each of the domains on the CCIE R&S v5 exam.
"Cisco CCIE RS v5 All-In-One: 6.0 Infrastructure Services" is available as part of a CBT Nuggets subscription. Subscriptions are available for individuals or teams, and can be paid monthly or yearly.
About CBT Nuggets: CBT Nuggets creates on-demand IT training for individuals and teams that is available 24/7, from any device.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb12994910.htm
